mdRecord.dcterms:description: Facade and portico; pediment sculpture by A H. Richie

The Dome ... currently functions as a bar, restaurant and nightclub, although it was first built as the headquarters of the Commercial Bank of Scotland in 1847. The Dome is a category A listed building. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Dome,_Edinburgh [work]
